title: Epic Games Store has more PC players than ever - 295 million, in fact
description: 295 million PC players have used Epic Games Store in the last year, up 25 million from 2023, and 898 million are using Epic cross-platform accounts - that's up 94 million. Together, we've run up 2.68 billion hours of playtime. Read more
author: Vikki Blake

title: Get The Entire Vampire Hunter D Novel Series For Just $13
description: Ever since Bram Stoker introduced the world to Dracula, vampire fiction has been a top-seller over the decades. Over in Japan, one of the best entries in the genre is the long-running Vampire Hunter D books series by author Hideyuki Kikuchi. If you've been looking to sink your fangs into the novels, you can grab the entire series at a big discount thanks to Fanatical's new Vampire Hunter D: The Complete Sada Book Bundle. The full 30-book bundle is just $13, which is a massive 93% off the bundle's normal $209.70 value. See bundle at Fanatical Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Every Battle Pass Skin Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 2
description: We're one week from the start of Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 2 in battle royale, which launches on February 21, and in a very pleasant Valentine's Day surprise, Epic has revealed the entire lineup of battle pass skins. And when we say "lineup," we actually mean it literally this time, as you can see the entire crew assembled for a police lineup above. For a much closer look at each of these skins, scroll down to the gallery below for some individual glamor shots.The highlight, no doubt, is the lone collaboration on the battle pass: Sub-Zero from the fighting game series Mortal Kombat. There are eight distinct characters included in the reveal, so this should be every skin in the battle pass. Keep in mind, however, that all of them will have at least one alternate style. So, for example, we've got Sub-Zero in his classic blue look here, but we can expect at least one of his many other looks as well--there are way too many potential options to choose from, so we won't bother guessing.Beyond Sub-Zero, the pass appears to be made up largely of the colorful member of a heist crew, led by a new version of Midas who stole Domonic Toretto's gold chain--it's not quite the Fast & Furious-themed season we were hoping for, but it's close enough for now. After that, we've got a pickle man, a girl wearing a traffic cone on her head, a lady with two very long braids wearing a 19th century-inspired shirt who is not from Arcane, and a very dapper wolfman who I suspect may actually be the one getting robbed in the upcoming season.While the battle pass reveal is the biggest announcement thus far about Fortnite's upcoming Chapter 6 Season 2, it's not the only thing we know about what to expect from the new season. For everything else we know, check out our rundown here. And for much better looks at each of the skins, keep scrolling.

title: Marvel Rivals Dev Says They're Not Trolling Dataminers - 'We'd Rather Spend Our Time Developing the Game'
description: Marvel Rivals dataminers think the developers are trolling them with lists of potential future characters hidden in the game's code. But NetEase and Marvel say they have better things to do...like actually make the game.

title: Out today: Afterlove EP, the visual novel about grief and rock music from the creator of Coffee Talk
description: Afterlove EP is the new visual novel and/or broken hearts album from Indonesian developers Pikselnesia. Itâ€™s the sad, sleepy tale of a musician, Rama, who is trying to put his life back together and reconnect with his old bandmates in Jakarta a year after the death of his girlfriend, Cinta. The complicating factor is that Cinta isnâ€™t entirely gone: she is a voice in Ramaâ€™s head, chatting to him throughout the game's 28-day storyline as though sitting next to the player on the other side of the screen. title: Ten PC games I could have played, in full, during the time I spent failing to connect to Elden Ring: Nightreign on PS5
description: In an ultimately failed attempt at cobbling some Elden Ring: Nightreign impressions together, I spent a little over three hours of my Valentineâ€™s Day fruitlessly trying to get a match going in the roguelike spinoffâ€™s doomed PS5 network test. I hope said test provided FromSoft with some helpful data, considering Nightreign releases in May, though it would have been a lot easier for everyone if I couldâ€™ve just sent Hidetaka Miyazaki an email saying "Sir, your server infrastructure is made of biscuits." In the interests of a more productive outcome, here are some lovely/interesting/terrifying little PC games that I could have started and finished while waiting for the closed beta to sort itself out, and that you might enjoy regardless of whether youâ€™ve just spaffed away a perfectly good afternoon. Read more

title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 868
description: Soâ€¦what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isnâ€™t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. Itâ€™s just a list of more or less random questions Iâ€™ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. Shrimp or crab? Crab, but it canâ€™t be imitation, and it has to be fresh. 2. Yoga or pilates? Both are equally as challenging for this very out-of-shape lady at the moment. LOL! (Been a rough 12 months.) Iâ€™ll pick yoga; I could use a good stretch. 3. Something that makes you feel sentimental? When my phone brings up baby photos of Connor or old photos of Tabs before he got sick. My heart swells up every single time. 4. What book are you reading at the moment? Nothing at the moment, boo. I need a good one. Got anything to suggest? I would like something not too heavy or scary. 5. Something you wish you said no to sooner? I wish I wouldâ€™ve said no to[Continue reading...] The post Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 868 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.

title: Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 850
description: Itâ€™s the Super Bowl! As you know, before Tabs rocked the world by reinventing kitty supermodeling, he entertained millions as a professional cat football player. In fact, he won the Kitty Bowl a record eight times, making him more accomplished than even Tom Brady. Yes, Tabs was quite the cat athlete. Todayâ€™s game starts in a few minutes, and while Tabs is no longer here to watch the game with me, Iâ€™m sure heâ€™ll be watching from up above. This happens to also be the last Sunday before Valentineâ€™s. Marnie and Rosie are both more interested in that aspect of the day than the football. I can appreciate that. ðŸ™‚ Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict, Karen P.S.
